official_title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution requiring that federal judges be reconfirmed by the Senate every ten years.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Limits the tenure of specified Federal judges to ten years unless the Senate consents to a continuance in office.

titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution requiring that federal judges be reconfirmed by the Senate every ten years.
